markdownRemark.html:
This week has been a very productive week and I'm happy about the progress I'm doing when it comes to marketing myself via this new personal web site and I'm also building my network with more and more contacts that I hope one day will lead to something really enjoyable.

Stuffs done

This week have have accomplished the following;

  • launched my own web site,
  • learned Google Analytic on a basic level,
  • written a number of articles about JavaScript, Node.js and React.js, etc
  • got around 1000 views in from LinkedIn.
  • -

Stuffs that needs to be done

I'm working on the tree view component for the landing page but after that, it's cloud and microservie work.

The plan is to build and deploy a service in the cloud supporting contact forms and mail list subscription and I want to do it myself.

For more information about the project: My personal web site

Now it's weekend and I will not work and wish everybody a really nice time.
